reviews.review_msg: Nice enough person sometimes but you don't really learn anything you can really use outside the classroom. A lot of theory and politics in the class. Frequent use of breaks can get annoying because it cuts into the time for learning.

No other professor like her! Paola is the absolute best. Kind, attentive, social, knowledgeable and empathetic. She genuinely cares about her students and makes visible effort to see that they succeed! Class activities are so interesting and engaging and you leave everyday knowing you have gained so much . I highly recommend this class!!
